data.eml:eml: Description and phylogenetic classification of Stackelberginia cerberus sp. nov. (Diptera: Asilidae), comprising the first record of this genus from the Nearctic

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mcknight, Tristan A., Cannings, Robert A. (2017): Description and phylogenetic classification of Stackelberginia cerberus sp. nov. (Diptera: Asilidae), comprising the first record of this genus from the Nearctic. Zootaxa 4306 (4): 567-579, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4306.4.7
